Class UserService

java.lang.Object
UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service class for managing user operations like login and registration.

    • login

      public User login(String userId, String password)
      Logs in a user with the given credentials.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the User if login successful, null otherwise

    • registerStudent

      public boolean registerStudent(String userId, String name, String password, int yearOfStudy, String major, double gpa)
      Registers a new student.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      name - the name
      password - the password
      yearOfStudy - the year of study
      major - the major
      gpa - the GPA
      Returns:
      true if registration successful

      name - the name
      password - the password
      department - the department
      Returns:

    • registerCompanyRep

      public boolean registerCompanyRep(String userId, String name, String password, String company, String department, String position, String email)
      Registers a new company representative.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      name - the name
      password - the password
      company - the company name
      department - the department
      position - the position
      email - the email
      Returns:

    • isUserIdAvailable

      public boolean isUserIdAvailable(String userId, boolean allowRejectedCompanyRep)
      Checks if a user ID is available for registration.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      allowRejectedCompanyRep - whether to allow reuse of rejected company rep IDs
      Returns:
      true if available

      public void saveUsers() throws IOException
      Save all user data to persistent storage
